A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is actually a very good movie. The amount of people hating this movie with such a burning passion is truly shocking for me. I don't want to spoil anything for anyone who hasn't seen it yet\, but there were very few things wrong with this film. It was a little overly long in some spots and had some strange things that I know people will find controversial\, but it was a well made movie with a beautiful visual style and an interesting and actually thought provoking story.
